name: Skybox 1.1
description:
A 3D platformer Made in an unfinished Version using Cyberix 3D.Controls

Arrow keys to move

mouse(drag) to look around

This 1.1 update has now released with some extended features!

Game Updated 7/10/2016 to version 1.1!

1. This game is still not FULLY completed but is a bit longer!

2. You SHOULD now suggest using Firefox for BETTER EXPERIENCE!

I appreciate your support, Thank You For Playing The 1.0 Beta. :-)
